general.site.title: Carpooling and ride-sharing is easier and cheaper at Tripda
general.subject: Subject
home.about: Tripda is an online carpooling application created for people to share rides in a fun, easy and safe way. Our vision is to transform carpooling into a viable transportation alternative, one which allows passengers to travel with comfort and security while saving costs significantly.
home.banner.text3: Carpool easily in a fun, safe & economical way!
home.banner.text4: Helping the planet, one shared ride at a time
home.banner.text5: Save fuel costs while making new friends
home.box.about_one: Tripda is an online carpooling application created for people to share rides in a fun, easy and safe way.
home.box.about_three: Our carpoolers are students, young professionals, travellers and young-at-heart retirees - anyone who wants to meet new people, share stories and make trips fun.
home.box.about_two: Our vision is to transform carpooling into a viable transportation alternative, one which allows passengers to have multiple departure and arrival places and travel with comfort and security while saving travel costs significantly.
home.box.security: With Tripda, you know exactly with whom you're travelling. You can read user ratings of both drivers and passengers made by users that already travelled with them. Besides the login via Facebook, the email and mobile verifications allow us to guarantee that only the best drivers and passengers are using Tripda.
home.box.sustainability: Carpooling is sustainable in four different ways: environmentally, less cars on the road means less pollution; socially, it fosters meetings between diverse people from different backgrounds; culturally, it spreads the concept of the sharing economy; and economically, it helps people save money!
home.email_confirmed: Your email address has been confirmed
home.email_confirmed_fail: We were unable to confirm your email address

home.why_tripda.icons.convenient.descrip: Find, sort and filter potential travel companions and arrange your carpool in seconds with no effort and no wasted time!
home.why_tripda.icons.convenient.title: Convenient
home.why_tripda.icons.economical.descrip: Reduce travel costs by sharing! Get to where you need to be at a fraction of the cost of alternative travel methods
home.why_tripda.icons.economical.title: Economical

meta.description.home: With Tripda, you can travel more spending less. Carpool with cool people who will share your trip costs with you.
meta.description.institucional-about-us: Tripda is a free online platform created so individuals can carpool and share rides across their countries in a fun and cheap way.
meta.description.institucional-contact-u: We work hard to improve our platform. For that reason, your comments are extremely important to us!
meta.description.institucional-how-it-wo: We want to connect real people. For that reason, we must assure we're identifying you correctly. Please register through Facebook.
meta.description.institucional-ladies-on: Focused on our female public, we allow them to travel only with other lady drivers and passengers, giving them an even greater sense of safety.
meta.description.institucional-privacy-p: The protection of your personal data is very important. That's why we adopt several practices and strict policies to manage this data.
meta.description.institucional-security: Our concerns towards safety go from User Rating to cell phone number verification. All this so you can share a ride with an easy mind!
meta.description.institucional-standards: The driver commits to trips he truly has the intention of making. Passengers commit to pay the agreed price to the drivers.
meta.description.institucional-sustainab: Carpooling helps the environment by taking cars off the streets, reducing carbon emissions as well as promoting sharing economy.
meta.description.institucional-terms-of-: Anyone of legal age or legally capable that utilizes Tripda services must accept the Terms of Use and every policy and principle that reigns them.
meta.description.institucional-users-rat: Every driver and passenger that offers or take rides at Tripda is rated by other users after the trip, so we can have safety references for our community.
meta.description.offer-seats: Offer rides to cool people who will share your trip costs with you. At Tripda you know who's travelling with you, assuring your safety.
meta.description.partners: With Tripda, you can travel more spending less. Taking or offering rides with cool people who will share your trip costs with you.
meta.description.search_trips: Best rides leaving {{ departureCity }} to {{ destinationCity }} at {{ departureDate }} - Search results at Tripda - fast and reliable carpooling
meta.description.trip_view: Ride offered by {{ userName }} from {{ departureCity }} to {{ destinationCity }} at {{ departureDate }} at Tripda, the most reliable carpooling platform in India
meta.description.user_cars: My cars - The passenger will know the brand and model, as well as the available space for luggage and if a certain car is equipped with air conditioning.
meta.description.user_messages: My Messages - Our main goal is to connect drivers and passengers in a safe way, so they can travel more spending less.
meta.description.user_notifications: My notifications - We leave you updated on the status of your rides, so you can travel with peace of mind. Notifications appear on the site and on your e-mail.
meta.description.user_preferences: My preferences - Every user knows what to expect from your ride and can select their trip buddies according to their preferences.
meta.description.user_profile_general: My profile - It's important to complete your profile so other drivers and passengers know how fun and reliable a trip with you can be!
meta.description.user_public_profile: Profile, trips and ratings from {{ userName }} at Tripda, The most reliable carpooling platform in India
meta.description.user_trips: My trips - Optimize the space of your car by establishing stopover points throughout your route, adapting to the needs of your passengers.

payment.bank_account_information: Add Bank Account: Bank Account Information
payment.cash.help.offer:
When you choose to get paid with cash, your passenger will pay you directly at the end of the ride. 
Please remember to check with the passenger(s) that they have enough cash to cover the ride cost, and remind them to pay once you've reached your destination.
payment.cash.help.pay:
When you choose to pay with cash, you pay the driver at the end of the ride. 
Please remember to check if you have enough cash to cover the ride cost, and donâ€™t forget to pay once you've reached your destination.
payment.credit_card.error: You have entered an invalid card number. Please check your entry and try again.
payment.credit_card.help.offer:
With TripdaPay, all fees collected from passengers for your ride are transferred directly to your bank account: 

1. Passengers will book seats in your car using a credit card 
2. Payment is collected at the time of confirming a ride 
3. We notify the driver only when the payment is approved 
4. Payments are transferred to your bank account after the ride
payment.credit_card.help.pay:
With TripdaPay, you pay rides using credit card and we automatically pay drivers after the ride occurs. 
Your payment is processed when you make the reservation. Don't worry! If the driver does not accept or cancel your ride, the charge will be immediately refunded to you.

Your payment is processed when you make the reservation. Don't worry! If the driver does not accept or cancel your ride, the charge will be immediately refunded to you.
